title: Projects
text: I am currently working on my thesis, which investigates the roles of social determinants of health in liver disease outcomes and various stages of the liver transplant evaluation process. The goal of this research is to identify actionable insights to reduce health disparities and improve patient outcomes.

title: Projects
text:
Environmental Health and Sarcoidosis
Another project focuses on examining the relationship between residential air pollution exposure and pulmonary sarcoidosis pathology. By leveraging geospatial techniques and analyzing explant patterns of disease, this work aims to uncover environmental risk factors that may influence disease progression.

Welcome!
My name is Kelly, and Iâ€™m a medical student with a passion for public health and research to address real-world health challenges. My current work focuses on studying social determinants of health in liver disease, with a goal of turning data into actionable solutions. Outside of academics, I enjoy finding balance through creative outlets, staying active, and spending time with my two cats. Feel free to contact me if you have any questions!
